catalog_script_client.name: Populate applicant name

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_d0e0491d97e20110002ffef3a253afd7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate applicant name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	g_form.setValue('applicant', g_user.userID);
	
	var user_ =  g_form.getValue('name');
	var userGRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	userGRecord.addQuery('sys_id', user_);
	userGRecord.query();
	if(userGRecord.next()){
		g_form.setValue('email',userGRecord.email);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-29 04:19:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d0e0491d97e20110002ffef3a253afd7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate applicant name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d0e0491d97e20110002ffef3a253afd7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-29 04:50:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
